name: @aceapp/scroll-to-top
description: A lightweight, zero-dependency scroll-to-top button with rocket animation

scripts.demo: node -e "require('http').createServer((req, res) => { const fs = require('fs'); if (req.url === '/') { res.writeHead(200, {'Content-Type': 'text/html'}); fs.createReadStream('demo.html').pipe(res); } else if (req.url === '/scroll-to-top.js') { res.writeHead(200, {'Content-Type': 'application/javascript'}); fs.createReadStream('scroll-to-top.js').pipe(res); } }).listen(8080, () => console.log('Demo server running at http://localhost:8080'))"

author: AceApp
